abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission directs Exxon Mobil to include resolution on shareholder proxy that could force oil giant to explain to investors how climate change, and related legislation, might affect profitability; remains unclear whether shareholders will approve resolution, but decision marks defeat for Exxon Mobil nonetheless.
lead_paragraph: A resolution, if approved, would force the energy giant to outline for investors how its profitability may be affected by climate change.

headline.main: S.E.C. Orders Exxon Mobil Shareholder Vote on Climate Data
headline.print_headline: Exxon Vote on Climate Data Ordered

snippet: A resolution, if approved, would force the energy giant to outline for investors how its profitability may be affected by climate change.
